Krisna Gupta {#title}

### PhD Candidate in Economics at The Australian National University (ANU)

At Crawford School of Public policy under supervision of [Arianto Patunru](https://crawford.anu.edu.au/people/academic/arianto-patunru). My thesis is about the impact of trade and investment policies to Indonesian firms. I am a full time lecturer at [Politeknik APP Jakarta](https://www.poltekapp.ac.id), part time lecturer at [Universitas Indonesia](https://www.ui.ac.id/), and an associate researcher at [CIPS Indonesia](https://www.cips-indonesia.org/about).
